ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Alchemy tips
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks. egtrade had what I really needed, the new formulations. I m up to lvl 45 with my shaman now. I just got a bigger hunting dog. I m going to work my
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:04 AM 12/9/2006 +0000, you wrote:

>--- In <mailto:EverQuest%40yahoogroups.com>EverQuest@yahoogroups.com,
>"Edward Fox" <edward001b@...>
>wrote:
> >
> > The old system of alchemy is in the process of being overhauled. A
> > year ago, I did the kitty shaman alchemy quests just short of the
> > epic. I lost interest and decided that it was more fun to just lvl
>by
> > hunting.
> >
> > Now I have a lvl 43 shaman with 21 points in alchemy. The trainers
> > won't increase my points above that until I actually atart using
>the
> > skill. G.
> >
> > The old formulas have changed. Has anyone worked out the best way
>to
> > bring the alchemy points up yet with the new formulas? I'm doing
> > homework on this too. It's still in progress. I'll share what I
>find.
> > Has someone else already invented the wheel? G.
> >
> > Edward Fox
> >
>I don't know if the site is still around, but www.eqtraders.com used
>to be where I went to find out about recipes and skilling up in
>tradeskills.
>-Su

Thanks. egtrade had what I really needed, the new formulations.

I'm up to lvl 45 with my shaman now. I just got a bigger hunting dog. I'm
going to work my experience up just a bit more before I try hunting the
elite giants. The coned blue when I was at 44 but the till beat me down
faster than I could beat them down. Berserkers coned blue to but I could
beat them down a little bit faster except when I had a dire wolf chewing on
me at the same time. I'm watching the tracks closer. I died several times
while slugging it out with a berserker when a couple of wolves walked up
behind me.

Edward Fox
